name: 東方神妙災 ～ Autocatalysis of Unrecognizable Katzenjammer
name_original: 東方神妙災 ～ Autocatalysis of Unrecognizable Katzenjammer
description:
(This game's story strongly correlates itself to my other games from the same universe, of which you can find in my account's itch.io page)

The Moriya Shrine.

Following the retrograde of the cards incident, Sanae couldn't help but notice something else was at play too. As the beautiful, blossoming explosion in the sky unveiled that its charm was actually maleficent - in her eyes -, Sanae sets out to investigate what sort of unknown fragments were those that scattered around Gensokyo. Guided by Kanako and Suwako, she seeks those who have been in contact with this miraculous jewel to try and retrieve those curious artifacts, while also trying to identify who could possibly be the perpetrator of this newborn incident.

Unbeknownst to her, other people were also trying to take advantage of these strange powers contained inside the fragments. What would it be of Gensokyo if this chaos isn't contained in time? It seems like it's up to the Moriya Shrine shrine maiden to uncover the truth behind all of this... 

東方神妙災　～ Autocatalysis of Unrecognizable Katzenjammer is a fan-made Touhou game developed in LuaSTGExPlus0.82b (utilizing the Ryannlib framework as a base) on LuaSTG Editor Sharp X 0.72.1, by Ryann1908, that follows the style of games such as 弾幕アマノジャク　～ Impossible Spell Card or Spell Card Collection, where you fight through a multitude of spell cards declared by a multitude of bosses playing as Sanae, utilizing (or not) miraculous items or gadgets to help you on these battles.

The game is divided in 4 main acts + two extra (non-canon to the game's story) acts (each with 4 scenes, totalling 24 spell cards + 1 from the tutorial). At first, only the 1st act is unlocked, but as you progress through the scenes the other acts will be unlocked. At the start of the game, only 2 items will be free at your disposal, the rest of them being unlocked with time. More information contained inside the game's manual!

This game contains original art made by Ryann1908, featuring original music tracks from BrownCake and ElianTempest, with borrowed songs from Misora/深蒼穹, Gondayu/権太夫, and ISMTUD. You can find the song playlist here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxTCWJk5biy2w35p9OZsoqdH19Cpaij9h

And at last, see you on the next autocatalysis...
